entry.title: [WW] I would like to try oral minoxidil for hair loss, but it’s not available where I
entry.content: I would like to try oral minoxidil for hair loss, but it’s not available where I live. However, looking at topical solution it’s ethanol, propylene glycol, water and minoxidil at 1mg/ml. So I guess it should be pretty safe to consume with straightforward dosing. Is there any catch, like oral and topical minoxidil being in different form etc.?
